segments.text: A friend told me I might find a room here .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes . I ’ ll have a room free next week .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: 25.00 dollars a week , but you can't have visitors .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Fine.Would it be OK to look at the room ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Could you come back later ? We ’ re right in the middle of dinner .
segments.speaker: S2
